text: Mara d temlilem akked wid ijehlen, ewwtet ar tmegrav ar ten t$elbem. Arzet pen nezzeh. Sinna, d aserree ne$ d feddu, alamma isers ioad tiaekkwmin is. Akka, lemmer i S ihwi i Oebbi, yili I$leb iten, maca a kwen Ijeooeb, kra s kra. Wid ipwan$an deg ubrid n Oebbi, ur poueun igiten nnsen, d awez$i
